languages.text: Взирая на обескровленные и израненные миры, Вольный Торговец видел{mf||а} бесконечные возможности роста своей династии. Из пепла, в который обратились десятилетия относительного покоя, готовилась взойти новая амбициозная сила.

Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.
languages.original_text: Взирая на обескровленные и израненные миры, Вольный Торговец видел{mf||а} бесконечные возможности роста своей династии. Из пепла, в который обратились десятилетия относительного покоя, готовилась взойти новая амбициозная сила.

traits.locale_text: Gazing upon the drained and wounded worlds, Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ash, into which decades of the relative piece turned, a new ambitious power was ready to rise.

Gazing upon the drained and wounded worlds, Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ash, into which decades of the relative piece turned, a new ambitious power was ready to rise.

Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

languages.text: 行商浪人凝视着枯竭、衰落的诸多世界，看到了无数能让{mf|他|她}的王朝发展的机遇。在相对和平的几十年里，某个雄心勃勃的崭新势力从旧日的余烬中逐渐崛起。
languages.original_text: Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人凝视着枯竭、衰落的诸多世界，看到了无数能让{mf|他|她}的王朝发展的机遇。在相对和平的几十年里，某个雄心勃勃的崭新势力从旧日的余烬中逐渐崛起。

languages.text: Als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auf die ausgesaugten und verkrüppelten Welten blickte, sah {mf|er|sie} unzählige Wachstumschancen für {mf|seine|ihre} Dynastie. Aus der Asche der Jahrzehnte relativen Friedens sollte sich eine neue, ehrgeizige Macht erheben
languages.original_text: Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

traits.locale_text: Als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auf die ausgesaugten und verkrüppelten Welten blickte, sah {mf|er|sie} unzählige Wachstumschancen für {mf|seine|ihre} Dynastie. Aus der Asche der Jahrzehnte relativen Friedens sollte sich eine neue, ehrgeizige Macht erheben

languages.text: En inspectant les mondes exsangues et ruinés, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} y vit d'innombrables opportunités de consolider sa dynastie. Une nouvelle puissance ambitieuse était sur le point de s'élever au-dessus des ruines de plusieurs décennies de paix relative.
languages.original_text: Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

traits.locale_text: En inspectant les mondes exsangues et ruinés, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} y vit d'innombrables opportunités de consolider sa dynastie. Une nouvelle puissance ambitieuse était sur le point de s'élever au-dessus des ruines de plusieurs décennies de paix relative.

languages.text: Al observar los mundos consumidos y maltrechos, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente vio un sinfín de oportunidades para reforzar su dinastía. De las cenizas de décadas de paz relativa surgiría una nueva potencia llena de ambición.
languages.original_text: Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

traits.locale_text: Al observar los mundos consumidos y maltrechos, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente vio un sinfín de oportunidades para reforzar su dinastía. De las cenizas de décadas de paz relativa surgiría una nueva potencia llena de ambición.

languages.text: 疲弊し衰弱した世界を目にして、ローグトレーダーは王朝が成長を遂げる果てしない好機を見て取った。相対的に平和だった数十年の停滞を経て、野心的な新勢力が台頭しつつあった。
languages.original_text: Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

traits.locale_text: 疲弊し衰弱した世界を目にして、ローグトレーダーは王朝が成長を遂げる果てしない好機を見て取った。相対的に平和だった数十年の停滞を経て、野心的な新勢力が台頭しつつあった。

languages.text: Bitkin düşmüş ve sakat kalmış dünyalara bakan Hür Tacir, hanedanlığını büyütmek için sayısız fırsat gördü. Nispeten barış içinde geçen on yılların arkasında bıraktığı küllerden, yeni, büyük bir güç yükselecekti.
languages.original_text: Gazing upon the drained and crippled worlds, the Rogue Trader saw innumerable opportunities for the growth of {mf|his|her} dynasty. From the ashes of decades of relative peace, a new ambitious power was set to rise.

traits.locale_text: Bitkin düşmüş ve sakat kalmış dünyalara bakan Hür Tacir, hanedanlığını büyütmek için sayısız fırsat gördü. Nispeten barış içinde geçen on yılların arkasında bıraktığı küllerden, yeni, büyük bir güç yükselecekti.
